text: The Memphis Grizzlies Radio Network is the regionally delivered sports network featuring game coverage of the National Basketball Association franchise Memphis Grizzlies. The network is a joint venture between the franchise and Skyview Networks.“Memphis Grizzlies Choose Skyview Networks for its Complete Solution to Broadcast Management” November 27, 2012. The network has broadcast Memphis Grizzlies basketball since the team relocated to Memphis from Vancouver, British Columbia (Canada) in 2001. ==Affiliates== ===Tennessee=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! style=";"|Market ! style=";"|Station ! style=";"|Affiliation ! style=";"|Notes |- | rowspan=2 | Memphis | WMFS-AM 680 | ESPN Radio | rowspan=2| Flagship station |- | WMFS-FM 92.9 | ESPN Radio |- | Brentwood/Nashville | WNSR-AM 560 | CBS Sports Radio | Also broadcasts at 95.9 FM via FM translator W240CA |- | Lexington/Jackson | WBFG-FM 96.5 | ESPN Radio | |- |} ===Kentucky=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! style=";"|Market ! style=";"|Station ! style=";"|Affiliation ! style=";"|Notes |- | Paducah | WDXR-AM 1450 | | Also serves extreme southern Illinois, including Metropolis and Cairo |- | Drakesboro/Central City | WPDQ 103.9 FM | CBS Sports Radio | Repeater of WNSR Brentwood, TN. |} ===Arkansas=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! style=";"|Market ! style=";"|Station ! style=";"|Affiliation ! style=";"|Notes |- | Conway | KASR-FM 92.7 | | |- | Forrest City/West Helena | KCLT-FM 104.9 KAKJ-FM 105.3 | | |- | Jonesboro | KNEA AM 970/95.3 FM | | |- | Stuttgart | KWAK-AM 1240 | | |- |} ===Missouri=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! style=";"|Market ! style=";"|Station ! style=";"|Affiliation ! style=";"|Notes |- |Cape Girardeau |KGIR AM 1220 | | |- |Malden |KLSC 92.9FM & KMAL AM 1470 | | |- |} ===Mississippi=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! style=";"|Market ! style=";"|Station ! style=";"|Notes |- | Booneville | WBIP- AM 1400 | |- | Jackson | WYAB 103.9 FM | |- | Tupelo | WTUP AM 1490 | |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Memphis Grizzlies official website * WMFS Category:Radio stations in Memphis, Tennessee Category:Memphis Grizzlies Category:Sports radio networks in the United States Category:National Basketball Association on the radio
